ygData.subject: Re: Specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: I think they are referring to the practice points that you apply to a given specialization. Your prime specialization would then be that skill where you invest
ygData.messageBody:
I think they are referring to the practice points that you apply to a given
specialization. Your prime specialization would then be that skill where you
invest 51 practice points.

I could be wrong.

-----Original Message-----
From: Iggie/Alyssandra/Jane Pierson <ldyiggie@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 6:52 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Specialization


From: "Iggie/Alyssandra/Jane Pierson" <ldyiggie@...>

I'm confused about the Specialization skill. I keep hearing about on skill
going
higher than 50 and the rest up to 50. However, as a level 12 wizard, my
magic
skills are currently maxxed for my level at 65. It's the numbers that are
confusing me.... 50 what??

Iggie
feeling pretty dumb at the moment <G>
